function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of dbaf to prevent moisture buildup","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement a filtration system to remove formaldehyde and toluene from the indoor air","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement a filtration system that matches the size of the building space","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular replacement or maintenance of the filter","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sealing of leakage points, periodic inspection of filter system","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of more effective sorbent beds, optimization of airflow rate","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Calibrate and validate the accuracy of the sensors regularly, and cross-check readings with alternative moisture measurement methods","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maintain optimal bed water content to ensure effective filtration, establish monitoring protocols for bed water content levels","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular calibration and validation of concentration measurement equipment, cross-referencing measurements with alternative methods","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement efficient ventilation systems and air cleaning technologies","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular maintenance of filter beds, monitoring of air temperature and rh","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement proper ventilation and use of protective equipment during testing to reduce exposure.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct regular validation of emission estimation methods and consider transient effects in the mass balance equation.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Include the sink effect term in the mass balance equation and implement continuous monitoring of contaminant levels.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of standardized emitting materials for accurate simulation of pollutant levels","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of proper ventilation and personal protective equipment ppe when handling toluene and other vocs","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extend the monitoring period to gather additional data on long-term performance","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of the chamber, proper ventilation, and use of air filtration systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sealing leakages, regular inspection and maintenance, use of air quality monitoring systems","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Professional installation, regular inspection and maintenance, monitoring of air quality after integration","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement policies and urban design strategies that promote physical exercise, mobility, and access to green spaces","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stratifying counter stations across the city to correct for spatial biases in strava data","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improving data collection strategies to capture activity levels of low-income and marginal groups","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ensure access to small green spaces within the city for all social groups, not just the general population.","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging staggered recreational activities to avoid overcrowding and promoting the use of online reservation systems for trail access.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote safe recreational activities with social distancing guidelines","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitor and regulate capacity in parks and green spaces, encourage staggered visitation times","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage staggered use of outdoor recreational spaces to distribute activity more evenly throughout the day.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote weekdays as prime time for outdoor recreation to reduce weekend crowding.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage employers to implement policies that promote staggered work hours to avoid peak outdoor recreation times.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limit the number of people on the trails and enforce mask-wearing and hygiene adherence to proper hygiene practices during fieldwork.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict data access controls, encryption of sensitive data, and adherence to data protection regulations.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate weather variations as a factor in the assessment of recreational activity during lockdown.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use 95% prediction confidence intervals as benchmarks to assess the significance of observed deviations in recreational activity.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporate spatial covariates such as population density, land use, and accessibility into the assessment of recreational activity during lockdown.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict data anonymization protocols and secure data transmission practices. obtain informed consent for data collection and use.","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combine search query data with other sources such as surveys, observational studies, and community feedback to validate findings.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use multiple data sources and validation methods to cross-check strava data, and consider the limitations of strava user data in interpretations.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorporate error margins and confidence intervals into the analysis, validate absolute counts with other data sources, and consider the limitations of calibration methods.","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use detrending methods cautiously, consider the impact of detrending on data
